description.p: JetBrains Toolbox App is a lightweight desktop manager that centralizes installation, updates, and launch of JetBrains IDEs and related tools. It provides a single, consistent entry point for discovering JetBrains products, installing specific versions, and keeping them up to date without manual downloads or package juggling.
It handles license sign-in and activation, shows release notes, and preserves per-IDE settings and plugins when switching versions.

The Toolbox App makes multi-version workflows simple: you can install and run several versions of the same IDE side by side (stable, EAP, or older builds), pin versions for reproducible workspaces, and roll back to a previous build if an update causes issues.

ul.li: Centralized management of all JetBrains tools and versions
Easy installation of EAP and ARM64 builds where available
Safe, atomic updates and convenient rollbacks
Integration with JetBrains licensing and account sign-in
Remote development support (Toolbox Agent + host management)
Project-centric launchers and unified URL handling
Configurable update and proxy settings suited to corporate or offline environments
